name: MadisonGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Madison Guide”
”Alexa, ask Madison Guide to give me an activity”
”Alexa, ask Madison Guide for breakfast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: madison guide
des:
Madison Guide gives you recommendations of tasty restaurants and fun attractions in Madison, Wisconsin. You can ask for restaurants for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or coffee shops. Try asking for indoor or outdoor attractions, or attractions that are within a certain distance. Madison Guide can also tell you a little about the city of Madison. 

HOW TO USE:
First, say “Alexa, open Madison Guide.” Next, ask for a restaurant or attraction by saying, “Give me restaurants” or “Recommend an attraction for me.” Check out the example phrases section for more things you can say. 

If you want to ask for an attraction or restaurant when you're not already in the Madison Guide skill, say “Alexa, ask Madison Guide for places to eat breakfast.” or “Alexa, ask Madison Guide for an outdoor activity.” Check out the example phrases section for more things to say. 

EXAMPLE PHRASES:
“Alexa, open Madison Guide.”
"Alexa, ask Madison Guide for a restaurant." 
"Alexa, ask Madison Guide for breakfast."
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide for lunch restaurants.”
"Alexa, ask Madison Guide for places to eat dinner."
"Alexa, ask Madison Guide for coffee."
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide for an attraction.”
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide for an attraction within 50 miles.”
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide for an outdoor attraction.”
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide for indoor activities.”
“Alexa, ask Madison Guide to tell me about Madison.” 

OTHER INFO:
If you have any questions, feedback, or recommendations of attractions or restaurant s that should be added, please email me at andrewallencc@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
